mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, provider, nickname, profile_image) VALUES(#{request.email}, #{request.provider}, #{request.nickname}, #{request.profileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT m.nickname, m.profile_image AS profileImage, m.age_range AS ageRange, m.gender, SUM(gp.AMOUNT) as greenPoint FROM member m JOIN green_point gp ON m.ID = gp.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.id = #{id} GROUP BY m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.age_range, m.gender
